name: AddEnumOptionToCustomField
description:
Add an enum option to a custom field in Asana.

This tool adds a new enum option to a custom field in Asana, updating the list of enum options. Use this when managing custom fields and needing to expand the choices available. Requires 'custom_fields:write' scope.

parameters.name: custom_field_identifier
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the custom field in Asana. Use this to specify the field you want to modify.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the custom field.

parameters.name: include_optional_properties
parameters.description: List of properties to include in the response that are excluded by default. Provide these as an array of strings.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: enum_option_object
parameters.description: A JSON object representing the new enum option to be created, including its properties.

value_schema.description: The enum option object to create.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Enable to receive a readable JSON response with line breaks and indentation. Use primarily for debugging as it increases response size and time.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.description:
Provides “pretty” output.

parameters.name: opt_fields
parameters.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: custom_field_gid
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the custom field.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the custom field.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: The enum option object to create.

value_schema.description: The enum option object to create.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
